author: {'steamid': '76561198139328230', 'num_games_owned': 2324, 'num_reviews': 260, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1488133284}
review:
Well, [i]The Tape[/i] is an indie horror game with not much variety or intrigue into it. It's not horrendously bad like most indie horror games made in Unity here around, but it's nothing especially worthy of your time either. Aside a basic charm and some potential, it ends up being tedious anyhow. So, this will be mostly an informative review rather than a genuine upvote or a direct downvote. Decide for your own self.

It should be safe to assume that it's sometime between 60s and 80s in America. We are taking the brief role of a detective who searches for a missing young girl in a rural area. The introduction cinematic presents us a brief phone call between the mother of the girl and our detective in somewhat okay English - it might be important to note that the developer is not a native English speaker, so we'll encounter some problems with the narrative. Luckily, there is not much dialogue or written anecdotes within the game anyhow. After the phone call, we somehow arrive to our destination: a two-story abandoned house at the middle of nowhere. Our brief search is constantly recorded through a camera, I suppose - thus, the title of the game - explaining the constant darkness and flashing white static when you move the camera. Throughout our brief search, we'll go through the house, the dungeon beneath, a series of haunted hallways, a dark water level and finally, a forest. At the end, we'll be given the opportunity to run away with our lives or seek for answers. Neither of the endings are interesting or satisfying, and this will be it.

So... let's begin with display options, shall we? Aside the basic Unity horror environment in pure black and white, the main feature of the game is the camera mode which is presented for the purpose of augmenting the effect of the atmosphere. It is claustrophobic and quite disorienting, sure. But it serves to be a headache rather than being actually effective as a horror element. So, after trying to do this thing in the right way for 5 minutes, you give up and turn the camera mode off anyhow. After that point, there is nothing fundamentally scary. Well, this might be a bonus point actually. Most games in the indie horror genre end up abusing jump scares and screeching sound effects. Here, we'll have none of those. The game takes on a slow pace, heavily relying on atmosphere only and the sound effects are mostly appropriately unnerving. Is the atmosphere really scary? Nah, not really. It's the Unity version of a satanic cult settled under a big house and some haunting occurrences.

The main problem is that nothing you do or discover within the game is actually entertaining or intriguing. You keep walking around, go through a pathetically easy stealth portion to be caught by our not so neighborhood friendly cultists. After that point, whatever happens might be explained as either an actual haunting or a heavy drugging case, where you get to live through some nightmares. Whichever explanation you take. You end up in a pretty effectively haunted hallway, where our demonic victim resides, get a warm (?) welcome from her and start running. You get to light three candles and leave the hallway, then... the really frustrating and annoying part of the game begins. In a dark semi-flooded area, you are expected to run around and get near some light orbs, so the gigantic demon head wouldn't end up swallowing you. There is no saying when and where the thing will spawn, so you mostly rely on luck in this part. After that, you are back to the forest. This time you are chased by cultists in the woods, so you get to pick a direction (and an ending) to go, all the while trying to avoid getting stuck on branches. After that, well done. You beat the game.

Now you can either be done with it all, or if you are completionist like me, you can try for the bonus levels - which will give you some achievements when completed. One bonus level is the dark-flooded level with the demon head all over again, in which you are supposed to survive for 5 minutes. This was pathetically tedious and annoying. Another asks for you to switch between cameras until you collect 20 notes. Lights go out sometimes, so you gotta collect fuel to reactivate them to keep the demon girl away. Easily done. The last one - The Forest - is seriously annoying, where you are to walk around in the forest to again collect some notes. You are supposed to be chased by a monster there, yet I've encountered nothing in that level. It was the most boring walking simulator ever for me.

In and all, the main scenario presents barely an hour of gameplay - even with the frustration for the demon head. Bonus levels included, you would be done with all this game presents within 2 hours. Another hour is required to drop all Steam cards. Well done. Seriously. You are done now. The story? What story? You've encountered some cool satanic enactments, and you survived. Isn't this enough already? Joke aside, there is really no story. The whole thing is mostly an excuse to present an environment experience wrapped in really annoying camera features.

When this game first came to Steam, the original price was 5 dollars. Now, that was a huge exaggeration for whatever you'll be getting yourself into here. Now, the base price is dropped to a dollar, so it should be a safe bet to go for. You might try it without actually losing much here. Worst case scenario, you'll get some achievements and Steam cards. It is somewhat sad really, because I do believe that the game holds some potential. I especially liked the cultists themselves. With some actual story, or at least an epilogue stuck at the end, it would be an okay game. As it is, it is a "meh, why the hell not for a dollar" title. Enjoy, I guess.

Please also check out Lady Storyteller's Curator page [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ladystoryteller#curation]here[/url] - follow for regular updates on reviews for other games!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007943969', 'num_games_owned': 2219, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1487708157}
review: Nie lubię dawać dislike, jednak tutaj powinien się pojawić. Gra zapowiadała się ciekawie i na tym się skończyło. W pewnym momencie zadajemy sobie pytanie WTF?! Liniowa z kiepską grafiką, po kilku minutach traci klimat. Bonusowe levele też dość mocno irytujące, a już mapa Forest to przegięcie z szukaniem ;) Aby w pełni móc ocenić tytuł, zmolestowałem grę do końca i wymaksowałem. Ale, szczerze ... nie polecam nikomu ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1485897629}
review:
[h1]Описание игры:[/h1]
Симулятор хождения с элементами хорора. В сюжет можно не заморачиваться, даже несмотря на то, что приподносится он на русском языке. Но если все таки для галочки упомянуть, то мы разыскиваем пропавшую девушку, заходим в заброшенный дом, а дальше спускаемся в бесконечные катакомбы расположенные в подвале. Там вобщем оккультисты, маньяки и прочая ахинея из мозга автора игры. Действий с нашей стороны минимум - просто добраться до перехода на следующий уровень, иногда попутно что-то собрав (ключ, записки и т.п.).

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
¥ Приятная графика в стиле старых чернобелых ужастиков. Шипение, эффекты, картинка - хороши.
¥ Игра полностью на русском языке (текст).

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
¥ Очень слабый, садистский, бессмысленный сюжет.
¥ Наш герой может проходить почти сквозь любые предметы, но не может зайти через закрытую дверь, и нужно искать маленький ключик.
¥ Нет бега... Все очень медленно.
¥ Нестрашные скримеры.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Подтянуть сюжет, сделать чуть-чуть динамичнее, изменить монстров и только тогда подавать людям на пробу. На текущий момент - слабая, скучная игра, сродни сотням похожих проектов. Проходите мимо.

[h1]Оценка: 3/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075507228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1484905476}
review:
I can't bring myself to dislike this game. It's so incredibly, endearingly dumb. 

Not only is it mostly stock assets from unity, every single element in the game is a road-weary stock horror trope. It reads like an edgy short story for a 7'th grade creative writing class. The environment is so delirious and changes so frequently, instead of being disoriented you think "oh, he's trying to disorient me, that's precious." The enemies' movement isn't even completely animated for god's sake. A good one third of the objects in the game don't have collision. 

Despite all that, it has a good rhythm and it keeps a good pace. Some unintentionally funny moments (a lot of them actually.) It's got a few tense moments too, and the end in particular is actually a pretty original and cool boss fight (a rare thing in a walking simulator). I recommend it to the same type of person I would recommend a Uwe Boll film to. 

I paid sixty cents for it though. If you pay too much more than that you'll feel like you got ripped off, I think. I've got just under an hour in it and I finished it. I could go back for the other ending, but even then that's an hour and ten minutes maybe.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043609914', 'num_games_owned': 3556, 'num_reviews': 834, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1483051385}
review:
The Tape is one of the weirdest horror games I have ever played and it's bizarre nature is not good.

In The Tape you play as a detective who is tasked to find a missing girl in a US suburb. He explores a house where she was kept and the more you venture the more the messed up the situation becomes. 

The Tape is a really weird horror game as it's split into segments which all have different play styles, so I'll break it all down how each segment plays.

In general the game is a stealth game, where you have to hide from cultists while you try to get to your goal. But in later segments the game throws a lot more hazards making it harder to explore the environments around you, but all the environments are barren there's no point in exploring any of them.

The Atmosphere and some of the cultists designs are the only good things I can find about this game, nothing else.

The game has this really annoying film grain and I have no idea why it's there. Even though the game is called The Tape the game looks like any other horror game. Adding a really terrible film grain doesn't make it feel like found footage.

The game is also incredibly buggy, some of the bugs are also game breaking. The dream sequence with the candles I had to repeat multiple times since most of them the game bugged out and didn't let me progress. The first time the enemy that kills you on the spot was stuck in the only door which leads to the exit and if you go back to the starting door and pass it the game doesn't let you go back. 

The Tape is also incredibly short, it took me 40 minutes to finish it, but it has a bit of replay value. The game has two endings and a few other game modes in the bonus tab, so you can a solid two hours of play time, but the game is also really bad so I doubt you will want to go back,

Overall The Tape is not very good game, I payed 50 cents for it which I got from selling Trading Cards, but in general I don't think this game is very good and with that 50 cents I could have gotten another, better game on sale. Just skip this and just get something else.

Final Rating:
3/10

Pros:
+ Good Atmosphere 

Cons:
- That film grain ( I know you can turn it off, but it's how it was meant to be played, so I'm deducting points for it)
- Short
- Game Breaking bugs

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1482624665}
review:
"The Tape" ist ein langsames und kurzes First-Person Horror-Exploration Game.

Wir sind ein Detektiv auf der Suche nach einem verschwundenen Mädchen. Wir starten bei einem verlassenen Haus auf der Suche nach Antworten.

Besonders macht "The Tape" sicher der Grafikstil. Grundlage dafür ist eine schwarz-weiß Unity-Grafik über die ein Filter gelegt wurde, der das Bild und die Helligkeit leicht ins Zittern und Pulsieren bringt, wodurch Unschärfe und leichte Farbverschiebungen entstehen. An sich ein simpler, aber atmosphärischer Effekt, der an das Abspielen alter, nicht mehr ganz intakter Filmrollen erinnert. Problematisch nur, daß der Effekt rasch anstrengend wird. Glücklicherweise kann man diesen Effekt aber auch abschalten. Stark auch die Soundkulisse. Wummernd mystisch spüren wir die Irritation im Magen.

In sehr langsamem Tempo stapfen wir denn also durch Räume und durch Kellergewölbe, haben kaum Interaktionsmöglichkeiten (nicht mal Kühlschränke können wir öffnen), müssen und mal verstecken, und geraten in eine Welt und in einen Zustand, der uns an der eigenen geistigen Gesundheit zweifeln läßt.

"The Tape" ist verdammt kurz. In weniger als einer Stunde sind wir durch, sofern wir begreifen, was gerade unsere Aufgabe ist. Ein bißchen Bonus-Content gibts noch obendrauf - eine Kombination aus "FIve Nights at Freddy´s" und "Slenderman" etwa (schalte zwischen Kameras hin und her und sammle 20 Zettel ein) oder einen reinen "Slenderman"-Klon - wirklich fesseln kann einen der Zusatz-Content aber auch nicht. 

Das Game ist irritierend, erklärt wenig, die Antworten am Ende werfen eher weitere Fragen auf, als etwas zu klären. "The Tape" wirkt denn auch eher wie eine Loseblattsammlung durchaus kleiner, durchaus kreativer Levelideen denn wie ein wirklich auserzähltes Game. Die syntaktisch schwachen englischen Texte tragen auch nicht gerade zur Abrundung bei. Und so werden wir denn mit Fragezeichen zurückgelassen, haben gute Atmosphäre erlebt, die aber wenig mit uns gemacht hat, denn alles blieb denn doch kryptisch.

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
8/10 Atmosphäre
3/10 Story
6/10 Grafik
7/10 Sound
5/10 Spielmechanik
5/10 Spielspass

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Creepy, kurz und kryptisch.

[h1][b] Gesamtwertung: 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198078519628', 'num_games_owned': 1567, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1483131686}
review:
Well...This game certainly has potential. I've played way worse when it comes to horror games here on steam, honestly, specially since we've been getting a shit flood of horror games that are full of stock assets and suck ass.

The first thought that came to my mind as soon as I started playing this game? My god, the camera effect is AWFUL. I found it incredibly disorienting and it quickly gave me a headache. The fact that stuff glows white with that effect is probably the thing that fucked me up the most. The dev thought about it, so there's a way to disable that and play the game in mostly monochrome, and the tip on the loading screen tells you about that, so mad props to the dev, maybe he thought "Well, this is a bit overwhelming."

Now, about the gameplay. Unlike other Unity horror games, this one doesn't abuse ear raping, obscenely loud jumpscares. And that, my folks, is something that I can truly appreciate. The atmosphere is heavy most of the time, but I feel like that atmosphere quickly dies out once you see the first enemies in the game. They barely notice you, and when they do, they aren't even properly animated, they just slide through the floor. Now, this is another problem I've got with the game. It is incredibly slow. There is no way to run, and most of the time, I keep hopping around like a dumbass because it gives me the vague illusion that I'm going faster. Spoilers: I'm not.

The sound is good sometimes, and a bit unremarkable at others. Nothing too loud most of the time, just sublte tracks and ambient noises that are decent. 

The game is really, really short, I finished it in about 40 minutes, even after dying quite a few times at some points in the game. (COUGH COUGH LIGHT ORBS COUGH COUGH)

Now, the minigames. Oh god, the minigames.

In Dungeons of Terror, you move through 4 cameras trying to find pages and fuel. There's torches in every camera that keep the demon girl thingy away, but they go out on their own. So, that's why you need the fuel. Now, the cameras and the fuel...It seems like they appear randomly. I finished this mini game without knowing what I was doing, I just kept rapidly switching between the gameras, and I barely saw the demon girl. 

In Dark Water, you're floating above a black abyss (WIth water, I think). You can spin around in 360 degrees, and random blobs of light fall from the sky. You've got to collect them by clicking them, while you're spinning around. You're spinning around to find more orbs, and of course, to look for the huge head of the demon girl. It randomly spawns somewhere (Most of the time, out of view), and quickly starts moving towards you. You gotta find her before she gets to you, and drop a light orb on top of her to make her stop. There's a timer counting how long you've been alive, and the head keeps getting faster and faster each minute. My only complain about this minigame? You move way too slow, and if it spawns behind you after the 4 minute mark, you're fucked.

Now, Forest. My god, Forest. It's like Slenderman, same premise of collecting 8 pages while being chased by a monster (Same demon girl.).
I found this mini game UNGODLY and fucking frustrating. Unlike in Slenderman, there's few landmarks, the map is quite big, and there's no road or anything for you to follow. Just grass, trees, and lots and lots of branches where you can get stuck incredibly easy. I walked around for a while and kept getting stuck on branches. I always found a way around them, except one time. I turned around....THE DEMON GIRL WAS THERE....Not doing anything. Okay? She followed me for a while while I was getting my ass handed to me by treant branches. And then, I reached the end of the map. And fell off the map just by jumping....Okay? This mini game is ungodly. I've never felt so lost in my life.

TL;DR

I don't think it's worth the full price, I got it during a sale, and still, while I kinda enjoyed this game, I would certainly not recommend this to anybody else who isn't as used to shitty games as I am. It's incredibly short and frustrating sometimes. But hey, I've certainly played worse before, like Despair. I do not regret the cents I spent on this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198337418722', 'num_games_owned': 15, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1497187940}
review:
Хорошая игра. Качественно сделала. Но хорором не назавешь. 
Есть своя стилистика. Чтоб скоротать время впринципе можно и поиграть.
Прошел несколько раз и собрал все достижения. 
Дополненения так же как и игра сыроваты. Не плохо если бы был добавлен интерактив.
В игре нет ничего чтоб напугало бы меня. 
В общем есть много минусов, но ставлю плюс. Есть куда развиваться.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096111174', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1531874815}
review:
Esse jogo me ensinou o que é ter sanidade.

Pois claramente a I.A não tem.

Prós:
-Conceito interessante, dando o fato de que você estaria vendo o jogo pelos olhos da câmera, não os seus.
-Em algum momento do jogo eu fiquei levemente tenso, eu acho.
-Pelo menos ele não tem jumpscares baratos e tenta aumentar o "clima" aos poucos.
-O último trecho foi...legalzinho, apesar de você precisar de um pouco de sorte para passar.
-Tenho que admitir que fiquei surpreso ao ver que o jogo tem 2 finais (sim, ele tem). Então 1+ pro cara.
-Acredito que o criador tentou fazer algo legal.
-O preço está no ponto.

Contras:
-Você vê o mundo pelos olhos da câmera, mas por alguma razão ele dá a entender que são seus olhos. Ex: Você usa as duas mãos pra sair da cova, dando a entender que você usou a boca segurar a camera. Plus subir e descer as escadas. Mas acho que aí já estou ficando exigente demais.
-O jogo é...pobre em terror. Ele tentou, mas não conseguiu me deixar nervoso mesmo
-Tem muuitos jogos melhores, mas, pelo preço, esse está no ponto, suponho.
-A I.A nesse jogo e a programação em geral são bizarras, e eu ainda me pergunto se aquilo é de propósito, ou no processo de criação se pensou: "Tá, vamos ver até onde eu consigo ir com isso." Ex: No meio do nada o monstro brotava do chão, eu morria, e tinha que coletar os itens todos novamente.
-Algumas partes você vence mais por sorte do que por azar. Ex: Um dos últimos trechos, onde basicamente, você tem que esperar que aquelas bolotinhas brancas não vão correr de você, ou que a mão de Deus (sei lá que mão era aquela) não vai puxar aquilo pro Limbo.
-A história é bem tosca e estranha, se você quer saber.



6~7/10 ~~Eu acredito que, para um jogo indie, feito por uma pessoa só, o jogo não é tão ruim assim. Mas ele tem vários altos e baixos (a maioria, baixos), mas, com certeza não é o pior jogo de todos, e pelo preço, está bom.


Se eu tiver paciência, se pá eu atualizo a ánalise depois de jogar uns modos bônus do jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048631765', 'num_games_owned': 1383, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1479659731}
review:
Самый большой плюс игры — её стилистика. Разработчик создал потрясающий фильтр, при котором контуры предметов двоятся, цвета переходят из одного в другой и малодетализированное окружение выглядит вполне реалистичным. На этом плюсы заканчиваются. Неинтересный, плохо поставленный сюжет, короткая длительность игры и откровенно "тупые" уровни. Особенно хочется выделить бонусный уровень Forest mode. Каким же нужно быть y6людком, чтобы создать такой безчеловечный челендж? Тебя кидают в дичайше огромный лес и предлагают искать записки, разбросанные по нему. Но как я уже говорил лес просто нереально огромный. Когда я туда попал я сразу принялся искать маленькую хижину с запиской. Измученный скитанием по бесконечному лесу через 30 минут я наконец-таки нашёл эту хижину и радостно побежал поднимать победную записку. Как же скорчилось моё лицо, когда в центре экрана появилась надпись "Вы собрали 1 записку" и на фоне заиграла музыка — с этого момента тебя начинает преследовать скример. Я взял себя в руки и за следующие 30 минут собрал ещё 3 записки. 4 из 5 записок, подумал я, и принялся искать последнюю. Следующий час был самым длинным в моей жизни. Знаете, говорят время идёт медленнее, когда кого-то ждёшь или выступаешь на важных спортивных соревнованиях, нет! Медленнее всего в этом мире идёт время во время прохождения Forest mode в игре The Tape! Целый час хождения кругами по чёртову лесу! Полез в ютуб искать прохождение, дабы найти последнюю записку и что я узнаю? Записок-то оказывается не пять, а восемь! Восемь, КАРЛ! ВОСЕМЬ ЗАПИСОК! Развернулся, убился об скримера и дропнул игру. Создатель сего уровня обрёк себя на вечные адские муки после смерти. Без этого инцидента игра неплохая, на больших скидках можно взять.

[quote]Если тебе понравился обзор — ставь палец вверх и подписывайся на мою [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/RAINICORN_CHANNEL#curation]кураторскую страничку[/url], на которой я пишу краткие рецензии на интересные мне игры.
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/RAINICORN_CHANNEL]Вступи в группу[/url] и получи ключ от случайной игры в подарок![/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561197973230221', 'num_games_owned': 14325, 'num_reviews': 849, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1475500569}
review: The story mode is very short, find a item, open a door, go a few floors, avoid some enemies, survive a few minutes an enemy and than evoid enemies and reach a target, thats it and than there 3 bonus maps (1. Dark whater not so bad idea, but a few times you cant pick up the lights and with easy tactic it isnt challenging), 2nd a futher good idea and if you find out how it works its fine, but there could be more leading words/ instructions, part 3 is great, only that you dont have a map or compass and feel lost and than there are invisible walls. Graphics are fine for a indie game, sound too, game length is to small. The price is to high. The developer support 1 year after is not existing anymore, all bugs like pushing start/ main menue and nothing happend stayed, the games feels unfinished and developer dont care (he cant help, he could if he wants, but he dont want). That price and support ruins the words. If you write critic words ont he hub get direcly censored from it. The 3rd worst developer ever i know. If you like explorer games/ walking simulators and buy it with disocunt over 70 % i would give the game a 53 %. The childish run away from truth developer deserves a -99%. Thx 4 reading.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027756435', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1474052582}
review:
"The Tape" is an example of indie horror done really well, without going overboard. 

=====

CONS: 

- Lack of terror: I didn't find this game necessarily very frightening, though I did find it was good for a little bit of added anxiety, at points, regarding "getting away', etc. For a horror game, I would've preferred it to have been a little bit more frightening. 

- Lack of story: The story really didn't do it for me.. what little there is. But, in a way, I suppose its refreshing to know that a game doesn't need a whole lot of story to tell a creepy, unsettling, well... narrative, of sorts. The events make sense, though the overall story was a little lacking as a whole, and didn't really find a way to tie everything together in a fulfilling way. 


NEUTRAL (+/-):

+/- Visual effect settings: The "Heavy" visual effects setting makes the game hard to see at time, and for people with sensitive eyes, or who are prone to headaches, I don't recommend it. For those people that have a hard time with it, set the visuals to "low", and the game becomes monochrome, and ditches the heavy, fuzzy, visuals. Though, at times, even though it was a little straining to look at, I did find myself turning them back on. They really do add a unique touch to the game, and make it something more interesting than your average horror in terms of style. 

+/- Puzzles: They aren't really difficult, yet they don't really tell you anything, and aren't exactly straight forward either... if you've played horror games as much as someone like me has, you'll have no problem figuring them out. But for those who aren't used to using their brains as much for puzzle-type activities, this could stump you for a good few minutes. It's worth the effort, but it's not really difficult. It's kinda.. in the middle for me.


PROS:

+ Atmosphere: The atmosphere in this game is well done. There isn't any extra fanciness added to make the game seem like its spoon-feeding you eye-candy, and it introduces any and all "horror" elements with a reason, and with good taste. Its not trying to jump scare you and phone in some cheap excitement for Youtube Screechers to pretend they're frightened by. Its atmosphere is really well put in place. The visual style, granted, could be considered "extra fanciness"; however, it's possible to turn it off, and truly does add to the experience overall (for those who can withstand the eye-strain).

+ Sound effects/BGM: The sound effects and background music really add to the tension that the developer was trying to put forth in this game, and really help to tie the experience into a(n) (almost) complete package (barring a shallow story). Though, the lack of story elements don't really detract from the overall gameplay here, as all you need to know about the environment to 'feel' what the developer was trying to convey is the visual aspects, and the sound effects/BGM. 


=====

Do I recommend "The Tape"? 
Yes~! Absolutely~

It's an interesting, and short experience that neatly combines unique elements with tastefully placed stereotypical ones, to craft an interesting experience. 

And now to go watch some "tapes" of my own before work~

review:
Well. The Tape. This is a hard one to tackle. I like it but I dont, it has no real horror aspect but it has a the worst jumpscares some get you while some dont. I dont really have much to say about this one. I wish I did because then it would be useful to add to a portfolio but its whatever for this game. This game is well finely put. Just terrible, it needs to learn the aspect of horror and thriller and graphics. Dont even get me started, they look like there from 2005's Manhunt by Take two and Rockstar. Not impressed at all, wish I could actually say something nice to say but I dont. Im sorry oleg but its the truth.

Verdict:

0/100

author: {'steamid': '76561198166653860', 'num_games_owned': 3141, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 691, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 690, 'last_played': 1471468681}
review:
I won this game in a giveaway on Steamgifts, so I got it for free. 

I enjoy horror games that are widely considered "bad", and often I find something good in those games. There are not many games that I feel I have to warn others (not even Chernobyl Commando or Manhunter). 

I really tried to like The Tape, but I can't. 

That said, I cannot recommend a purchase of this product.

The game is divided into a main game and three bonus levels. Upon completion of each, an achievement can be earned. 

Spoilers ahead. You have been warned. 

The main game starts out okay-ish: a police detective looks for a missing girl. Alone. We find that kind of premise in a lot of horror games, so I won't criticize that. But upon [spoiler] entering the subterranean levels [/spoiler], the [spoiler] architecture and plot [/spoiler] becomes highly illogical: [spoiler] Why is there a Dark Water level? Is it only in the protagonist's head? Furthermore, why does he seem to be buried alive in the next section, chased seemingly by the same cultists that captured and buried him in the first place? [/spoiler]

The whole storyline told by the game does not make sense at all when summarized. And it's short. Depending on your pace, you can finish it in 45-90 minutes. 

Let's get to the bonus levels. I'll tag them as spoilers. 
Dungeons of Terror: 
[spoiler] The FnaF-clone. Although I am really bad at FnaF, I beat this on my first try without ever dying. [/spoiler] 

Forest: 
[spoiler] The Slender clone, although not a good one. You look for eight (!) grey pages in a black-and-white forest, no path, no landmarks for orientation, you're basically forced to run around aimlessly since everything looks the same. What's worse: you can fall off the map; you can clip through many of the trees, but you're stuck at others; you can clip through the Slend... erm... demon, but not all the time. Slender was fun, this was annoying. [/spoiler] 

Dark Waters: 
The worst one, and the reason for my relatively high playtime. [spoiler] You are surrounded by water, the demon comes in your direction and keeps getting faster. You can keep it at bay with light orbs. BUT: you can only turn left and right, with the speed of a snail. You hear the direction of the demon, but you can't react 99% of the time because you're so painfully slow. I managed it in the end with a lot of luck, constantly turning in one direction, and spamming orbs around myself. [/spoiler] 

So we have a short game with a dubious plot and underwhelming and even annoying bonus levels. 

The game description states: "Some of the scenes you are witnessing (sic!) in this game are the most disturbing in horror game history.", and "...reveals things so horrifying, that it make (sic!) him question his own sanity." Those superlatives are highly exaggerated, none of this is true. The Tape is relatively harmless. 

The game had potential, but as this is a finished product and the developer has been aware of the issues for about a year, it seems that nothing will change. 

If you're considering a purchase of this game, watch HarshlyCritical's playthrough on YouTube. He pretty much sums up the experience I had when playing it. 

Do not buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042701126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 262, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1477827158}
review:
This game is perfect example that if you follow what most people think you end up missing something that you can enjoy, its not always the case, but tbh, reviews here on steam serve to give me idea of what most people think but its never a decisive factor since most of them are based in first impressions.

For a 4 bucks game, im very surprised by its quality, and if bought on sale even better, the VHS aesthetic was great idea and helped a lot the create the mood, the creepy characters and the lack of jumpscares like promised, make this title interesting enough since when we talk about horror now days, jumpscares are thing to create a cheap feeling of fear.

The big cont, is a lack of interaction with objects and the story wasnt deeply explored wich could bring this game to another level, the creepy atmosphere is very well done for an indie-game, I just hope there will be more titles following this type of build.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167500140', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1469878956}
review:
Really short game. Probably the shortest I've played.
The gameplay is really limited, as most walking simulators are. But the game is not without its merits.
The visual style is unique and it looks really good. It's a bit disturbing to the eyes but that's the point. 
The setting and the story are also really nice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074059019', 'num_games_owned': 458, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1469595047}
review: Бессмысленный и беспощадный хоррор без сюжета, с плохим дизайном уровней, техническими ляпами (пропускающие сквозь себя текстуры), мутным нечто в качестве модели страшной девушки; концовкой, которая выглядит так, как будто в некий момент автору просто надоело делать игру. Если любите хоррорный инди-трэш на полчаса-час - берите по скидке, но лучше не спонсировать подобных разработчиков даже теми копейками, что стоит The Tape. На мой взгляд, если только учишься делать игры и пока получается не очень - выкладывай свои работы бесплатно. Коммьюнити в таком случае даже поддержит, а не напишет негативный отзыв, как это сделал я.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989290281', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 315, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1476025258}
review:
https://youtu.be/Pv06f2qgk8E

Very hard to really recommend this one. Apart from the random crashes, it is just so slow paced. You see, you cannot sprint - at all. As the first part of the game is a 'stealth' action sequence the lack of sprint becomes frustrating fast. 

In fact there is very little interaction of any sort - I found no documents or story elements, and you can't interact with anything as the game takes care of that for you. Not even joking here. So you basically just hold down 'W' and move your mouse around to progress through the game.

Finally on the level with the lake, the slow grind and repeated deaths broke my will to play any further. For the positives you can at least turn off the VHS tape effect, and the audio is pretty decent, but that's about it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042646749', 'num_games_owned': 1460, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1468778085}
review:
I was able to buy 'The Tape' when it was on sale, so I thought I'd give it a go in spite of the pretty negative reviews. Well, it turns out I can't give it a go. Because in my backward country, we use AZERTY keyboards instead of QWERTY. See, the game won't allow you to re-bind keyboard keys and the keys are set for WASD. Now, I don't have a problem with WASD in itself but I do have a problem when controls are stubbornly fixed to those [b]letters[/b] (input) and [b]not the keys' actual position on the keyboard[/b], meaning for example that the W for 'forward' is located in the bottom row of the keyboard, the spot where Z is on QWERTY keyboards. As you can imagine, this makes the game practically unplayable.

So I can hardly recommend a game I can't really play. Also, I wanted to send out a warning to other AZERTY users and possibly even QWERTZ users, too. Should they fix this problem, I'll be sure to upgrade my review to an actual review of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993423351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1468432807}
review: Вплоть до уровня, где надо по воде ходить было более-менее интересно. Был некий стелс. Но далее тут пошла какая-то мудь уже. Гигантская голова мёртвой девочки из воды, каки-то светлячки, зачем-то отсчёт времени до чего не понятно. Каламбур какой-то. Возможно это типа страшный сон, но я больше не могу - не интересно биться об эту стену больше. Дальше игре почти нечего предложить игроку, кроме банальных инд-хоррор побегушек от бабайки.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113074241', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1468357033}
review:
Очередной неудавшийся проект аля инди хоррор, сколько многим пришлось наблюдать. И вы называете это игрой? Ха! Да это пародия на сатанистов(Спасибо, я поржала :D)и прочих хитовых страшилок! Оутласт для бедных проще говоря)

Вроде бы и ничего, но что-то все таки не то! Мы ведем диалог хрен знает с кем, идем по дорожке, заходим в дом, погуляем по нему, благодаря багам и на стол прыгать не надо, чтобы ключик взять, мы же можем пройти сквозь него и быть в самом столе!!! Это волшебно! И сананисты шепчут хрень на каком то непонятном языке аля хухре мухре) Не получилось и в пропасть упасть, а также поздороваться с благоверными! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=714531021 Какой то непонятный трупешник, подражающий слендеру, а также персонаж "неведимка" за которого мы играем. У тетьки или кто это(слендервуман?! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=719410007) выражение лица больше смешит чем пугает))) Я так "насытилась" фонариками, бубукающими скриммерами, водичкой в темноте, домишком(но не с привидениями), ну и конечно же кроваткой которая была в пиксельном томате) А про бонусы я вообще молчу :D Взять квест найди 10 записок, в лесу а как мне искать их? Спасибо хоть веселые ниндзя сатанисты не бубукнули по головушке) Да и потратив целый час на эту хренотень нашла только 2. Куда идти? Что делать? Нет  карты указателя или подсказок самых малейших, чтоб хоть понять куда тебя несет! Так еще чудо мол бегает за тобой)
И что же я об этом думаю? http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=714530706
Да помоему это очередная порция говна за которую и деньги та и отдавать не хочется, а тем более дарить! Лучше я за 12 рублей куплю ролтон без заварки! Если вы сатанист или алхимик для вас этот вариант хоррора не прокатит) Лишний гемор) Кушайте ролтон) http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=719410096

2/10

P.S а вы любите или верите сатанизм? :D http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=714772164

author: {'steamid': '76561198013045737', 'num_games_owned': 610, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1488066839}
review:
This game has a nice look to it, that ties in well with the story.  Simple as that may be.

It's very short, and not hard.  The gameplay is fairly intuitive.  

The game can be glitchy at times, for example I once fell through the floor but didn't die.  Luckily the chapters are short and it saves inbetween so little time is lost.

Overall I think it's a good example of atmosphere usage.  

It's not expensive so overall you get your worth.  I'd recommend this for horror fans who want a cheap but good experience.

I hope the developer hones their technique and makes more.  They have great potential.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139930865', 'num_games_owned': 302, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1467601174}
review:
This game is a very interesting one to me, I like the found footage/VHS ascetic it has going for it and the overall atmosphere of the game, it actually reminds me a bit of the Ring and the movie V/H/S. The film grain effect didn't really bother me though it can be turned down in the options menu. 

Overall the game is slow and creepy, starting out in a farm house and seems well put together, It IS fairly short with a slightly abstract plot which in my mind makes the game creepier. I haven't played any of the bounus modes yet, though the main story mode took me a little over an hour to beat. 

There were some good creepy moments and nice details in the environments I was disappointed that there was almost no interaction with the background to text descriptions. The animation was fairly good, and I encountered a couple minor bugs. Overall I really liked The Tape and had fun with it, after getting it on sale for 51 cents. I'd say this game is well worth picking up on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121753040', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1467274282}
review:
Неплохая инди игрушка про какую-то секту и повернутых на всю голову адептов. Хорошая и насыщеная помесь сюрреализма и мистики.
Плюсы:
1. Насыщеность. Несмотря на то, что игра состоит из банальных "найди записку", "найди выход", "убегай от монстра", различные действия происходят в разнобой, что позволяет избавится от однообразности. Всвязи с этим задания не успевают наскучить
2. Сюрреализм. Достаточно необычный и смелый сюр. За это особое спасибо
3. Сложность. Некоторые уровни "The tape" проходятся не с первого раза, но при этом не имеют запредельной сложности
4. Дополнительные режимы. 3 доп. режима игры
5. Цена. Брал на распродаже за 12 рублей
6. Сюжет. Сам факт его наличия уже плюс
Минусы:
1. Скримеры. Временами банальные скримеры
2. НПС. Очень тупые мобы
В целом игрушка добротная. Небольшое приключение, которое затянет вас на часок, плюс дополнительные режимы на 20-30 минут. Советую всем любителям инди-хорроров

author: {'steamid': '76561198011348365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1452361745}

author: {'steamid': '76561198038373540', 'num_games_owned': 3539, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1466993049}
review:
"The game relies mostly on creating heavy atmosphere, instead of a cheap jump scares. "

No.
This developer's statement is not true, game is much more jump scares than atmosphere.
Very short with some good parts but also many stupid ones (will not spoil).

That's main story but there are three Bonus missions, or to be precise-mods.
If I exclude beyond stupid Dark water mode, we have Dungeons of Terror, Five nights at Freddy's clone but with bugs. Sometime you will endure very long even in darkness and other time you'll be dead in 15 seconds on bright light. Frustrating and broken.
And last mode is Forest, complete Slender clone, with bugs of course. First time I wonder 15 minutes  clueless thru Forest and then I suspected something...is game maybe bugged?  And after restart, voila, real game started!

So, verdict.
I'll say its 5/10 but since we don't have mixed rating on Steam I must choose.
And I'll choose thumb up just because game is very fair priced and can be okayish to horror aficionados.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056385260', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1466678232}
review:
[h1]Клон Slender: The Arrival[/h1]

Видимо делать игры с поиском записок, после выпуска игры про Слендера, стало самой главной чертой большинства хорроров. Данная игра интересная, очень мрачная, психоделическая, страшная в некоторых местах. Можно даже сказать, что игра жуткая по своему виду. С оптимизацией все в порядке, сюжет как обычно не особо понятный, но играть интересно. Стоит ли покупать? Думаю стоит, к тому же вместе с небольшим сюжетом, приятными плюсами в виде достижений и карточек, нам предлагают еще и бонус игры.  Две бонус игры, вот прям слизали с [i]Five nights at freddys[/i] и [i]Slender[/i] - поиск записок в  лесу. Но тем не менее, все это выполнено в стиле игры и оправдывает свою стоимость. [h1]Оценил: 4.8 / 5[/h1]

Обзор написал Hilbert Schwarz.

-------------------------------------

[h1]Clone Slender : The Arrival [/h1]

Probably to make games with search of notes, after release of game about Slender, became the most important line of the majority of horrors. This game interesting, very gloomy, psychodelic, terrible in some places. It is possible even to tell that game terrible by the form. With optimization everything is all right, a plot as usual not especially clear, but it is interesting to play. Whether it is worth buying? I think costs, besides together with a small plot, pleasant pluses in the form of achievements and cards, offer us also a game bonus. Two the game bonus, here is direct have pinched with [i] Five nights at freddys [/i] and [i] of Slender [/i] - search of notes in the wood. But nevertheless, all this is executed in style of game and justifies the cost. [h1] Has estimated: 4.8 / 5 [/h1]

The review has written Hilbert Schwarz.

author: {'steamid': '76561198196773614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1510932283}
review:
So I reviewed this game once after playing it for maybe fifteen minutes. At first I thought it was great. The found footage aesthetic works nicely with the game and the cabin in the beginning has a wonderful atmosphere. Well it all goes downhill from there. Once you leave the cabin you're in a generic dungeon with the worst cult members ever (I mean it, the A.I. is terrible). From there things just get weird and there's really no explanation other than weird cult stuff happening.

Waste of time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198191293275', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1466558329}
review:
Ateşteki görsel hatalar , sınır çizgilerinin belirlenmemiş olması * Nesnenin içinden geçme problemi *
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=700306625

Kadının elindeki görsel hatalar
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=700306494

Üstteki ekran görüntülerinden de görebileceğiniz üzere oyunun ilk 15 dakikasında bu hatalar ile karşılaştım. 
-Oyunun şahsen can sıkan özelliklerinden birisi el,ayak vs. gözükmemesi.Uçan bir obje gibi hissettiriyor.
-Zıplama ve yürüme çok yavaş. Zıplarken süzülüyor gibi * Basılı tutunca * yürürken eğilerek gidiyor gibi * hız bakımından * yürüme hızının arttırılması oyunu daha aktif hale getirebilir ağır çekimde yürüyorsunuz.
-Çevre sesleri yok denecek kadar az,örneğin kapı açılma sesi bir çok kapıda yok.Ekstra sesler ateş vs. onlar da yok maalesef.
-Kameraya efekt verelim derken biraz abartmışlar. Çok sallanıyor ve karıncalanıyor. ( EDİT: KAPATILABİLİYORMUŞ AYARLARDAN )

Bunları bir yana bırakır ve olumlu(?) yönlerinden bakacak olursak;

Hikayesi her ne kadar basit olsa da oyunu geç saatlerde oynayınca gerilim yaratıyor. Değişik harita dizaynı var. * Ev içerisinden bahsediyorum *

Şöyle ki evin altında bulunan değişik mahzenler 

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=700306590

Labirentler ilgi çekici gelebilir. Oyun birazda olsa bulmaca tarzında ilerliyor. Etraftaki gardiyanlara yakalanmadan ilerlemeniz gerekiyor. Bazı yerlerde dikkatli olmanız gerekiyor yoksa iki taraftanda sıkışabiliyorsunuz. Bulmaca mantığıyla ilerlemek gerekiyor. Gardiyanların sesi ciddi,ciddi ürkütüyor. Haritada hikayeyi destekleyen objeler var,bunlarda bir yerden sonra ip ucu oluyor hikayeye

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=700306548 

Genel olarak hikayesi zayıf ama gerebilecek bir korku oyunu. Çerez niyetine oynanabilir fakat maalesef benim oyum hayırdan yana çünkü çok basit ve sürekli hatalar var.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201523528', 'num_games_owned': 918, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1464689159}
review:
The Tape is short, yes, but a very nice psychological horror experience. The VHS like video effect and fitting creepy music make the atmosphere really unsettling, in a good way for a horror title. Each little chapter is different with a tiny puzzle you need to figure out to advance. Nothing too difficult, plus the game has nice checkpoints in case you fail.

If you like to feel uneasy and a bit scared for about an hour, get this game when it's on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080147016', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1463243275}
review:
[i][h1]Домашнее видео![/h1][/i]
[i]Я не фанат ужастиков и не играл в лучших представителей этого жанра последних лет. Главным критерием хорроров для меня: сможет ли игра напугать и насколько качественно это будет сделано. Посмотрим, сможет ли The Tape сделать это![/i]

[h1]Сюжет.[/h1]
* Завязка проста и примитивна- найти пропавшую девушку. 

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=684105275
* Мы натыкаемся на дом, а в доме подвал, а в подвале дома культисты, а культисты эти- сатанисты! 
* Хочу так же сказать, что глюки Главного героя, и финал игры были мне не совсем понятны. Да и суть игры осталась для меня загадкой. 
* Не были раскрыты ни персонаж, ни жертва, ни плохие парни. Герой не выказывает никаких эмоций по отношению к происходящему, или он робот, или у него стальные яйца! 

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=684104757
[h1]Атмосфера.[/h1]
* Хороший ужастик славен своей атмосферностью. 
* Нас встречает черно-белая картинка, стилизованная по видеосъёмку. Она скрывает слабую графику и придаёт игре колорит. 
* Жаль, но на этом реализация идеи с камерой тухнет. Камера не дрожит в руках игрока, и не передаёт его волнения. Так же попадая в глюки детектива мы переносимся вместе с камерой. Как? Или я чего-то не понял?
* Нас пугают кровью, какими-то мумиями, масками, ожившими картинками и злобным волосатым призраком! Но получается не очень страшно. Но за попытку плюс!

[h1]Графика и анимация.[/h1]
* Модели персонажей и их анимация сделаны не очень качественно, но для инди проекта выглядит нормально. Локации проработаны с любовью, и тщательностью для инди проекта это плюс! Но кто выстроил эти подземелья под домом? Возможно воинствующие сатанисты?

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=684105067
* Полноэкранный режим почему-то совсем не на весь экран. Может это проблема Unity?
* Часто можно пройти через текстуры стола, дивана. Наш ГГ призрак? Это многое объясняет! Один раз застрял в текстурах двери: и не туды и не сюды! Пришлось перезагружаться!

[h1]Звуки и музыка.[/h1]
* Музыка отсутствует как критерий оценки.
* Звуки слабо поддерживают атмосферу, хотя они должны быть основой, струной на нервах игрока! Они скуповаты, в игре неестественно тихо. Слышны лишь помехи и звук шагов и открытие дверей. Другие звуки выполнены посредственно. Например, бой часов, который если хорошо обыграть пугал бы не хуже скримеров. Где же шуршание листвы на ветру? Где сердцебиение или дыхание персонажа? Звук подбирания ключа навевает воспоминания о 8 битных игрушках, но абсолютно не подходит для хоррора. 
* У ГГ приятный голос, который мы слышим только в начале игры при разговоре по телефону. Но все что происходит дальше глюки, сатанисты и прочее не вызывает у него никаких слов! Можно было бы хоть иногда восклицание: “Твою ж мать!”, как реакция на происходящее. 
* Субтитры и русское меню. Хотя в них нет надобности, читать здесь особо нечего!

[h1]Геймплей.[/h1]
* Беги и смотри по сторонам. В одной локации присутствует стелс составляющая. Драться нам не дают. 
[code]Что бы сделал герой другой игры или обычный человек встретив толпу непонятных людей в балахонах? Вариант первый: Сбежал бы, позвал бы подкрепление. Второй вариант: вернулся бы к машине, взял дробовик или другую пушку и устроил бы там геноцид. Но наш герой так туп, что он прёт на рожон с одной видеокамерой наголо![/code]
* Короткая игра, займёт не более часа игрового времени, но это так же её плюс, она не успевает наскучить!

[h1]Итог.[/h1]
[i]Увы, но The Tape не заставила меня шарахаться, или биться моё сердце чаще, были попытки, но не совсем удачные. Поэтому хоррор который не может напугать, это уже не хоррор! Рекомендовать игру можно только слабонервным и другим, кого это может ещё напугать! Ветеранам хорроров будет скучно и тошно![/i]

[h1]P.S.[/h1] Хочу сказать спасибо разработчику. Видно что создатель игры старался и вложил частичку свой тёмной души в игру. Если он проведёт работу над ошибками, то следующая его игра получиться не просто играбельной но и страшно-атмосферной!

С уважением, BananasBoy! [url=steamcommunity.com/groups/steamorators]Ораторы Ste@m[/url]. [url=store.steampowered.com/curator/9668988/]Куратор[/url].

author: {'steamid': '76561198043308688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1464388967}
review:
I read the reviews and I was doutbful if it would be any good but I thought, for the money, it was worth a shot. I'm definitely glad I tried it.

Pros:
+ Wonderful if you like horror movies such as the grudge/the ring.
+ Includes mini-games that are similar to Slender and Five nights at Freddys, 
+ If you have mixed feelings about horror games this one is very short (It probably took an hour at best to complete) so you could see if it's your thing. 

Cons:
- The fuzzy, video camera effect is fun at first but can be a little distracting after the first 10 minutes. The whole game is like that. 
- I had a repeated glitch where I kept getting stuck in the doors which meant I had to restart the game 3 times.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062269122', 'num_games_owned': 1154, 'num_reviews': 290, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1461943144}
review:
"The Tape" es un survival horror feúcho, donde la carencia gráfica se maldisimula ofreciendo la imagen como si fuera a través de una videocámara de los 90, de las que sólo sirven para grabar vídeos de caídas y mandarlos a programas de zapping. Superado esto, el juego va de cruzar varios escenarios terroríficos como puede ser una cripta subterránea llena de nazarenos deambulando por ahí, a un bosque en la noche lleno de gente siniestra cabreada que si te ven, van a darte collejas. En cada uno de los niveles tendremos que escapar de alguna manera que descubrirás por ensayo y error. No son cosas complicadas como comerte un kebab sin pringarte, sino puzzles sencillos del tipo de [i]busca estas cosas y la puerta se abrirá[/i]. Se trata de un juego corto (1'3 horas registradas actualmente, y me lo he pasado), sin mucha más transcendencia y que no volveré a jugar en mi vida.
El juego es en primera persona, y con la característica absurda de que no se puede correr y sí saltar, pero... ¡no hay que saltar nada en todo el juego! En cambio, sí tenemos que escapar o andar por largos pasillos durante el juego sin poder pegar una carrera para avanzar. Desde aquí pido un minuto de silencio por la lógica, inexistente en el juego. Sigamos.
La historia es regulera. No es mala del todo, pero no tiene ningún atisbo de originalidad. En cambio, algunas ideas presentes en el juego, como algunas zonas de escenarios o eventos que ocurren me han parecido buenos. Creo que estas ideas, en otras manos, podrían dar lugar a un buen juego.
En general, el juego no es más que juego de relleno de bundles, de esos de "ir por ahí esperando sustos", que vale para un rato mientras esperas en casa a que abran la licorería, y poco más.


[b]¿Y todo el juego tiene que ser con ese efecto de cámara de vídeo?[/b] Lo puedes desactivar en las opciones, pero entonces jugarás con unso escenarios muy bastos y monocromos. Tú elijes, o malo, o peor.
[b]Aunque sea corto, ¿se guarda la partida?[/b] Sí. Cada pantalla nueva, la guarda, por si quieres descansar los ojos del malo nivel gráfico antes de ganar dioptrías viendo el espectáculo que "The Tape" te tiene preparado.
[b]¿Va de asesinos o hay movidas paranormales por medio?[/b] Hay movidas paranormales. En una de las pantallas me encontré a Pedro Amorós con un cachivache lleno de LEDs y haciendo [i]pitiditos[/i] de todas clases.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276798449', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1462185013}
review:
Я понял, почему у этой игры смешанные обзоры. Мне кажется, что это из-за особенности визуальной составляющей игры. Действительно, долго я не могу поиграть, глаза начинают болеть.
А в общем игра понравилась. Правда для хоррора игра не совсем страшная, а местами даже забавная,  а может я ещё и не дошёл до страшных моментов.
Прыгающие сатанисты, которые меня вроде как убивают меня, очень доставляют)

author: {'steamid': '76561198053007379', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1462346649}

author: {'steamid': '76561198061066803', 'num_games_owned': 3431, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1462186277}
review: The Tape - это хоррор, жанр в последнее время, если не возраждающийся, то подымающийся с колен. Игра берет, не так скримингом из-за угла, как своей атмосферой, давящей и мрачной. Так же атмосферности добавляет эффект сьемки, а ля видеокамера, в купе с не сильно продолжительным сюжетом, обеспечит вам как минимум полукирпичный вечер. Как и в любой хоррор, играть строго в наушниках, и в темноте!

author: {'steamid': '76561198139536559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1461847316}
review:
The tape is a very basic, not that scary, short 'horror' game based on the story line that you are investigating the disappearance of a teenage girl. This game has some decent game play avoiding foes and overcoming mazes. However, this game is missing something very important. A SPRINT BUTTON! I found myself getting bored and the slow pace the game is set at, if your character was quicker (obviously speeding up gameplay and enemies as well) then this game would have had some what thrill towards it. A slow paced game with some decent ideas and concepts towards in. Lots of room for improvement and would give this game a go. It won’t exactly keep you up at night but there are some tense moment at points. Worth a play because of the price. 

Rating 4/10.

Kirkdawg

author: {'steamid': '76561198268228951', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1562746229}
review:
Unityエンジンで開発された「カルト宗教団体の施設へ侵入」というゲーム。
雰囲気はダークな感じを出しててかなり素晴らしくて良いんだけど、残念なことにバグがひどいし敵の作りがチープ期待していた程ではなくチープ過ぎて怖くなかったという点。
WASDキーとスペースキーで操作し進んで行き作りの安さを隠すために全体的に白黒にして明かりは暗くそして目がチカチカするようなヘヴィーエフェクトを使うことによって怖さやを出している点については個人的にはかなり好きです。
最近のアップデートでトレカが対応したがどうじゃなくて勝手にマップから落ちて中の構造が分かってしまうようなチートのようなバグを直してくれないかな。

author: {'steamid': '76561198091407678', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 199, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1558793890}
review:
The Tape is a first person horror game, with found footage stylization, slow pace and creepy atmosphere. 
The game relies mostly on creating heavy atmosphere, instead of a cheap jump scares. Some of the scenes you are witnessing in this game are the most disturbing in horror game history. 

The game tells story of middle-aged detective, who is tasked with search of a young girl, missing in US suburbia. He travels to abandoned house to check some of his clues and reveals things so horrifying, that it make him question his own sanity.
Features
Explore dark and terrifying mystery of missing girl. 
Face horrible creatures and enemies. 
Uncover the truth or atleast try to escape.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=669978038 

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=669428024

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=670904772

Good work for one person!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007563962', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1460590901}
review:
В это очень тяжело играть. И сейчас я объясню, почему. 
Дело даже не в банальных "что делать дальше", потому что рано или поздно вы додумаетесь до решения элементарных загадок самостоятельно. Дело, как мне кажется, в общей подаче. 
The Tape - не самый страшный хоррор. Я думаю, что по уровеню нагнетания соответствующей атмосферы даже пещеры Скайрима, пока вы ползаете там с луком, могут считаться куда более напряжёнными. The Tape же - это нечто в духе "пойди туда - не знаю куда". 
Мне, так и не поигравшей до сих пор в Аутласт, The Tape показался смутно похожим по завязке истории. Там был журналист, здесь мы имеем детектива, который поехал чёрт-знает-куда расследовать исчезновение девушки. И в итоге попался сам. В процессе игры происходит некоторая неведомая [strike]xepня[/strike] дьявольщина, в которую можно не вникать, потому что логически и даже визуально (то есть, текстом) это никак не поясняется.
"Бонусом" идут локации из игры, на которых надо делать крайне увлекательные и интересные *табличка "сарказм"* задания. Например, как можно дольше отпугивать с помощью света демоническую голову, собирать страницы с текстом в подземелье и бегать по бесконечному лесу с такой же целью. 
Важный момент: ставьте "эффекты камеры" на минимум. Без этой опции ваши глаза вытекут из глазниц в первые пятнадцать минут игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073301388', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 185, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1461413548}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020213340', 'num_games_owned': 1522, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1460596381}
review:
This game is quite short (less than 1 hour long if I remember correctly) but it's also pretty cheap (often you'll find it for 40% or 75% off). Think about it as paying 1~3 USD for a movie ticket for an immersive horror movie. I'd say it's worth it, if you're in the right mood.

There are a few extra mini-games you can play after you finish story mode but they're not really worth your time unless you want to get all achievements.

You should give it a try if you're into horror or those "walking simulators". 
Well, if everything goes wrong and you hate it you can just ask for a refund even after beating the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198171935374', 'num_games_owned': 142, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1464750423}
review:
Nowadays, it is modern to keep interesting and fascinating? Is it do you like to have a wild animal at home? Would you like to have a crocodile as a pet?
 On the one hand, it is educational as it teaches us how your pet behaves and how acts. You should read encyclopedias and get a lot of useful information about it. You should also learn how to take care of your pet.
 On the other hand, keeping a wild animal as a pet is dangerous. Your crocodile is teeth are sharp and they can hurt you. Your crocodile will be very large in several months and will take a large space.
On the other hand, keeping a wild animal as a pet is dangerous. Your crocodile is teeth are sharp and they can hurt you. Your crocodile will be very large in several months and will take a large space.

 To sum up, there are strong arguments both for and against keeping wild animals at homes. However, I consider that animals should live in their habitat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198185994751', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1460297184}
review: The Tape is, let’s say, neither worthy of your time or money. It’s a horror experience that has, in truth, very little to offer and isn’t very competent at delivering what it’s supposed to. Following the never ending trend of independent walking simulator using cheap horror tropes to try and make you jump off your seat, this game is really not different from what you can find for free on other types of platforms, hence why it doesn’t earn your one dollar. Your character can’t be bothered to walk faster than a tetraplegic turtle. Everything in this game is just so slow, from your character to cutscenes as well, so much so that it has gone way past the point where it tries to build an atmosphere more than it actually tries to round the two hours of gameplay so that you can’t ask for a refund. You can’t do anything else, you don’t run, you don’t crouch, and you don’t really interact with objects of any kind. You don’t even obey to some basic laws of physics by going through solid doors for god sake. Some sound effects are desynchronized. Models are very basic and ugly for the most part and the only semblance of “artistic vision” is achieved by cheap black and white filters. Combine that with the fact that the game has the audacity to run in circles in its second half and that enemies make you instantly restart at the last checkpoint and you have a game that has no sense of tension whatsoever. The plot fits on a stamp and isn’t even developed in any significant way. And as such, there is really nothing more to say. The Tape is an embodiment the terrible horror game tropes of the indie-game era which satisfy themselves with very little, another proof among many that lets you see why you can’t slap two lines of codes, some crappy filter and call it a day. Barebones wouldn’t even describe the experience, in fact I am still searching for the core experience these types of games are trying so hard to deliver without ever managing to do so.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063725672', 'num_games_owned': 10107, 'num_reviews': 458, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1460561640}
review:
Кучи багов, унылейший геймплей, наитупейший сюжет и никакущая атмосфера.  
Все 40 минут, что потратил на игру (большая часть времени повторы какиих-то глупых моментов в геймплее) - зевал, периодически прикрывая лицо фэйспалмом.   
Геймплейно игру можно сравнить с заключительным уровнем Pineview Drive в подземелье - если каким-то чудом вы были в восторге от него, то вы будете счастливы играя в "это" (чертовы извращенцы).
А всем остальным - не рекомендую даже приобретать игру по скидке и тратить на нее даже жалких полчаса.  
p.s. - достижения в игре получаем за изощренные по своей унылости и глупости и достаточно сложные бонус миссии, но не за игру.
1.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198044602606', 'num_games_owned': 7495, 'num_reviews': 544, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1466037057}
review:
This one was slow and boring. Plus, I somehow ended up in the same hallway that originally leads to the bedroom where the girl you watched being sacrifices comes back to life as a demon, with no way in or out of said hallway. Prior to that, I was just aimlessly wandering the hallways. I tried following the pools of blood, I tried following the direction the servants were all facing....nada. So....retired. I'll leave it unrated, but I wouldn't recommend spending 4 bucks for this. Maybe 50 cents. Maybe.


It does have potential however. With a bit of work. It has a Lord of Illusions feel to it, but it just isn't good enough right now, and of course the game busting bug I encountered.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028699981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1458239270}
review:
Стильный симулятор ходьбы из 5 карт. 
Сатанизм и VHS снафф муви, приправленные щепоткой загадок, стелса и скримеров.
Две концовки - одна охyтeльнeй другой и обе просматриваются менее чем за час.
Дополнительные игры, разблокирующиеся после прохождения - не вижу в них никакого смысла, к тому же они бажные.
Еслиб игра стоила дороже 100 рублей - рекомендовать бы не стал, ибо баги с отображением текста концовок и общая их нелепость портят впечатление, но с этой ценой потраченного времени не жалко.

Вообще, если у вас есть друг, который тащится по крипипастам и всякой мистике, то подарить ему такую игру под видом нечта странного - отличное решение. Игра неизвестная, что играет на руку атмосфере. Т.е. восприниматься the tape и будет, как таинственная жуткая кассета, запущеная в проигрыватель на свой страх и риск.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081836126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1484110556}
review:
Indie horror game that hard core horror fans will appreciate. It has it's flaws but makes up for it in atmosphere.

There is very little in the way of backstory as you quickly find out that you are investigating a dissappearance of a young girl. There was such a seamless transition from cut scene to game mode that I didn't even realize that I was supposed to do anything. Once I started pushing keys I was quickly on my way to the abandoned house at the end of the road and my investigation had begun.

The camera effects mode... well intentioned but just didn't do it for me and I had to turn it off after about 10 minutes as it was leading to a headache for sure. I found the basic monchromatic view so much better and a perfect fit for a story of this nature, almost with a Silent Hill vibe to it.

You make progress in the game primarily from exploration and use of logic. There is very little in the way of object interaction beyond just going through doors and such but the surroundings and backdrops are so nicely crafted that I found myself admiring the game from an aesthetic viewpoint.

One suggestion I would like to make to the developer (and many other developers who does not speak english as their native language) is that if you are looking for widespread acceptance of your game from people in the West, you should collaborate with someone who speaks/writes english well in order ensure proper grammer and pronunciation of spoken dialogue and subtitled content. On several of the games that I have reviewed recently I have noticed grammatical errors that are not a huge deal, but correcting these would provide the polish it needs to give it a more professional appeal. Like I said this isn't a deal breaker... just a suggestion. 

For such a short game I'm sure many could not justify the price but for a fan of the genre like myself I'm ok with it and it is a welcome addition to my horror collection. Recommended for those who like story driven games and the horror genre!

author: {'steamid': '76561198211572387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1454346925}
review:
Niestety, moim zdaniem wiele zachodu o nic. To nie tak, że gra jest do końca beznadziejna, spodziewałam się jednak po niej czegoś więcej. 
Pierwsze wrażenie - majstersztyk, atmosfera przyprawiająca o ciarki. Las, droga, opuszczony dom i trzeszcząca taśma. Tylko, że... już po paru minutach pyk i cała atmosfera się gdzieś rozmywa. Urywki brutalnych scen przestają robić wrażenie a zakapturzone, zamaskowane postaci tylko przy pierwszym spotkaniu przyprawiają o dreszcz. Również po zejściu do podziemi zniknęło mi gdzieś całe napięcie. The Tape zwyczajnie szybko nudzi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111968405', 'num_games_owned': 2283, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1466269105}
review:
The Tape offer a very good horror experience for decent price.
It is scary as hell, but game is far from great.

For example if you play with HEAVY camera effects its just destroy your eyes simulator 2016!
However on Low camera effects game is most enjoyable.

Biggest con for my taste is lack of object interaction in-game, but if we take in consideration that game was made by one man than this is somewhere the best we can get.

Overall; Nice horror experience 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198008737053', 'num_games_owned': 5218, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1482010529}
review:
The Tape is a psychologic  horror game in a first person view what a bit can remembering a walking simulator.
 
This game mostly based at creepy atmosphere, all game style follow this. The darkness, footage style with even more creepy mode, strange and weird objects. The story in a game enough simple, but how i said the atmosphere well compensate that, especially if you use a "heavy" camera mode, its can be very creepy. The game graphic not the best, but this you can miss because in a shadow you mostly don´t see a lot detail. The sounds are okey, well fit to game atmosphere.
 
So my verdict
 
+creepy atmosphere
+interesting camera mode
+steam achievements
 
-a bit buggy
-no trading cards
 
This game a very specific i think, because not all people like a horror games, especially a psychologic horror games like this, mostly people like games with more action. Well, this game do really creepy atmosphere, so if you are big horror fan you will should try it even though this game have a little problems too.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970964862', 'num_games_owned': 3790, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1460496646}
review:
Thanks Fantis for the Key.
Grácias Fantis por el juego.

No se por donde empezar con este juego:
Al principio pensaba que estaba viendo una peli 3D de aquellas del principio, las que necesitabas las gafas, esas de cartón, de dos colores, rojo y azul, creo que eran. Ya que los gráficos del juego posponen los colores como si las necesitaras.
Después de dejar el coche aparcado en un camino forestal, me dispongo a averiguar que hay que hacer, he supuesto que seguir el camino sería lo más obvio. Asé era. He encontrado una casa a medio abandonar con algunas ventanas abiertas, que me he asomado a ver que había dentro por si acaso, esto es un juego de terror por si no lo teníais claro. Pero yo aun no me he asustado. Palabrita. :)
Bueno pués después de mirar por la ventana y no ver a nadie, me digo po voy padentro. Y así hago me aprieto el cinturón un poco, le echo pelotas y entro. 
Pero no ocurre nada...Salvo algunos ruidos extraños (normal el juego es de miedo) pero no me he asustao aún...
Empiezo a abrir habitaciones a ver si sale un peazo monstruo y me come...pero no. Sigo abriendo puertas y me encuentro algo util, una llave. Y me pregunto ¿para que quiero una llave si las puertas se abren solas cuando me acerco?...Pués en una de las puertas que aun no había descubierto había una entrada a un subterraneo, bueno mas bien catacumbas, ya que me he perdido buscando como salir de ellas. Pero claro, y ahora si que me he asustao, ya que me ha parecido ver una peli de Amenabar, con las imagenes que se te van apareciendo, un tipo flashbacks de cosas que han pasado en esos tuneles.... os voy a dejar aqui la historia para si podéis y sale barato, lo compréis. 
El sonido en algunos momentos se oye distorsionado, aunque también es posible que los altavoces de mi tele, estén pidiendo un cambio. En cuanto a la ambientacién como os he comentado al principio esta chula...algo rara al principio, pero te vas acostumbrando a medida que vas avanzando en el juego. 

Pués poco mas, salvo la recomendación que os he dicho antes, si podéis pillarlo baratillo es una buena compra.

saludos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083486927', 'num_games_owned': 1512, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1466113212}
review:
Where do I start.

The game begins with you walking as slow as a god damn snail. You continue to progress through the game, walking as a fast as a god damn snail. And then things happen and you're not quite sure what is going on. You have no direction, just assumptions. And then you die a few times and have to start over because you bought this game.

Word to the wise, don't buy the game. In fact forget it exists. 
Don't think it is worth a sale price, because I paid $1 and I still want my money back.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002364572', 'num_games_owned': 489, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1453898434}
review:
一言でいうと雰囲気ホラー。
Unity無料版で制作された個人製作のインディー作品、値段も数百円ということで、クオリティやボリュームはなんとなく予想できると思います。
過度な期待さえしなければそこそこ楽しめる感じです。
なお、個人的にはグロやドッキリに頼らない演出系ホラーは好物なので、甘めの評価になっています。

ストーリー性はほぼありません。というか、最後まで意味不明です。ですので英語が読めなくても問題ありません。
アクション性はほんの少しだけありますが、何度もやりなおすようなものではありません。
ボリュームは、一度進行不能バグに陥ってやり直して１時間ほどでクリアする程度。
パズル性はちょっと考えれば誰でもわかる程度。ただしなにをすればクリアなのか一切の説明がないので、それを把握するところがこのゲーム最大の難所といえるでしょう。

ひとりでじっくり腰をすえてやるようなゲームではないので、友達といっしょにツッコミをいれながら遊ぶと楽しめるでしょう。
